title: Pre-Service Teacher Competency Development Course for Blended Learning Model Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with online learning tools (e.g., Zoom) and foundational understanding of curriculum design
context.additional_context: A course supporting pre-service teachers in designing and implementing blended learning models combining offline/online instruction, provided with digital devices (tablets, laptops, etc.), focused on science subjects

learning_goals: Analyze theoretical foundations and practical cases of blended learning to design models suitable for educational settings
Develop at least three blended learning activities (experiments, discussions, assessments, etc.) aligned with science curriculum characteristics
Establish a one-week lesson operation plan integrating Zoom-based real-time classes with an LMS (Learning Management System)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
